application

Class Classroom

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Classroom

  • public class Classroom
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a classroom. Each class is associated with a name, ID, teacher (name and ID), and a database. This class is used to keep track of students within a class and their progress. Example use: 
     
 Classroom class = new Classroom(currentPlayerID);
 
 class.getClassID();

    Since:
    1.0
